General.Name: Shenzhen Sunwin Intelligent
General.Description: Shenzhen Sunwin Intelligent Co., Ltd. operates as a smart city and artificial intelligent company in the People's Republic of China. The company primarily offers smart city, big data, artificial intelligence, and cultural and education services. It provides artificial intelligence services comprise service robots, UAV platform and image analysis data processing, facial recognition system, intelligent video analysis system, and others. The company also engages in the research, development, distribution, and operation of online mobile games; Internet social platform operation; and creating artificial intelligence and cloud computing solutions through offline and online for entrepreneurship and professional education, as well as offers Internet finance services. Shenzhen Sunwin Intelligent Co., Ltd. was founded in 1997 and is based in Shenzhen, the People's Republic of China.

7.Name: Mr. Da Wei  Wang
7.Title: Procurement Mang. of Data Center & Member of Supervisory Board
